title: Visual enhancements to the per-user MFA admin configuration experience
description: As part of ongoing service improvements, we are making updates to the per-user MFA admin configuration experience to align with the look and feel of Entra ID. This change does not include any changes to the core functionality and will only include visual improvements. Starting in August 2024, you will be redirected to the new experience both from the Entra admin center and Azure portal. There will be a banner present ed for the first 30 days to switch back to the old experience, after which you can only use the new experience.
